/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a dynamic element to the scene. Cars and bicycles are parked along the street, hinting at the daily life and movement of the city's inhabitants. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
